content: a beautiful centerpiece with raised petals perfect on an end table or as a doily under your most important lamp **size ** 20 inches 51 cm in diameter **materials ** * j & p coats big ball best six cord mercerized crochet art a 104 size 20 6 balls of no 1 white no 61 ecru or no 42 cream **or** * clark s big ball mercerized crochet art b 34 size 20 4 balls of no 1 white no 61 ecru or no 42 cream **or** * clark s big ball mercerized crochet art b 345 size 20 3 balls of white or ecru * milwards steel crochet hook no 9 **publications ** * coats & clark s book no 111 *priscilla® doilies* *c *1959/1960 * the workbasket® volume 28 number 10 july 1963 * coats & clark s book no 148 *old and new favorites by request* 1964 celt s yahoo group members can use this link 1 the pattern is reached from this page of doilies m-z 1 http //groups yahoo com/group/celtsvintagecrochet/files/doilies%20m-z/
